direction.raw_text: Rob clicks on the beam in the direction they went and sees the stairs. They race to them, up them, the door to the pantry is not locked. It gives way under Rob's pressure.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: REAL EYES BEHIND THE PAINTING, STARING OUT AT THEM

direction.raw_text: . PANTRY  NIGHT Kit scrambles up behind him. They can hear Buffy outside in the yard
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the kitchen door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob and Kit hurry in. Rob searches frantically for the key board.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The boat key... it's gotta be here... His flashlight sweeps the walls of shelves. Suddenly, Buffy is at the kitchen door. Though the door in locked, there's no bolt or chain to fully secure it. The knob RATTLES furiously under Buffy's grip, the door SHUDDERS. Rob spots a walk-in cupboard. He hurries to it. Kit gropes along the shelves, searching the objects hanging along the distant wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A long, ugly-looking knife blade slips in through the crack in the door. Buffy is using it to try to pry open the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob opens the door. Success. His beam falls on the key board on the inner wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit... I He steps in, following his beam into the darkness. The cupboard door
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shut behind him. He turns, trapped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door springs open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit spins, crying out as she sees:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The shadowed figure of BUFFY, barefooted, disheveled, in a smock, dagger in hand. She advances, breathing heavily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stumbles back desperately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob is desperately trying to break out, but the door won't open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit! Let me out! Let me out of here! Kit!! He is kicking the door, hurling himself at the door, but all to no effect. He barely has room to maneuver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Rob!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit turns to Rob's voice, takes a step toward the cupboard, but suddenly Buffy is there, cutting her off. Kit backes away, into the dining room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit! Run, Kit, run!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit reels back under Buffy's steady advance. Kit can't see her clearly in the dim light, but she can make out, beneath Buffy's wild, stringy, dangling hair, the madness, the likeness of Muffy -- the familiar face somehow twisted by hate and madness into a stiff, hideous, unnatural deformation. Buffy closes in, readying the long, greedy knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob, still struggling, knows Kit is about to die.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit! I love you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DINING R.OOM Cornered, helpless, Kit stumbles back toward the closed double doors that lead to the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Buffy?... please, we didn't mean any harm... we're leaving... we just want to go home... please... please... Buffy raises the dagger in hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No longer trying to escape. It's hopeless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (for all he's worth) Kit! I love you! I love you, Kit! A man's HAND reaches out from the side, lightly touching Rob's shoulder. Rob jumps, turning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is Buck, standing practically right beside him, staring at Rob. His face is the same bloody, hideous mess it was the day before, after the accident. Rob screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you too, babe. Rob swings at him, but only succeeds in smashing his knuckles against the door. Buck grabs him and violently plants a kiss on his cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit slams back against the double doors, nowhere to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... Oh, God... and Buffy strikes. The knife jabs into the door, close to Kit's head. Kit gasps, momentarily spared. She pushes apart the double doors and stumbles back into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All the lights are on, and when Kit takes her eyes off Buffy long enough to find out why, she discovers everyone is here -- Skip, Chaz, Nikki, Arch, Harvey, Nan, even the Constable and the ferryman. They sit or casually stand, quietly talking or reading magazines, taking no notice of her whatsoever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob is screaming uncontrollably. Buck calmly peels all the blood and gore right off his face and slaps in onto Rob. Rob keeps screaming. Then Buck reaches out and unlatches the door. It was right there the whole time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit is totally bewildered...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What.... ? Then she looks back at Buffy who steps into the living room, and smiling, holds up the knife and plunges it into her own hand. The blade is retractable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (wrought with emotion) Oh, fuck you!! Fuck you, you guys!! Suddenly everyone in the room comes to life, roaring with laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob stumbles out of the cupboard, Buck's gory make-up still stuck to his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit! ! Still frightened and confused, Rob hasn't put it together yet. He runs out of the kitchen...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...through the dining room and into the living room where he stops dead cold upon seeing everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ki--! The group laughs louder at the sight of him. Buck walks up behind Rob and claps him on the shoulder. Rob jumps and screams involuntarily. The group laughs louder still...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LIVING ROOM -- MOMENTS LATER Muffy is wiping off the last of her "Buffy" make-up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You guys are really terrific. I love you all. And I thank you from the bottom of my heart for being such good sports.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, sure. Quite welcome. Any time. He sits, or rather lands, on the sofa next to Kit. Laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob, you and Kit, you two were the best. You figured it all out. The clues really worked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What clues?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this all about? And don't anyone say "April Fool's" or I'll smack them in the teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about if I told you it was the script for a weekend special that's going to help me keep this house... Rob and Kit stare, mystified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, next month I get the house as part of my inheritance, it's true, but only if I can show my father that it can carry itself... what with taxes and expenses. Otherwise, he'll just sell it out of the family. So, I'm planning on turning it into a country inn. Not just another stuffy old run-of-the-mill country inn, but one that specializes in offering once-in-a lifetime Whodunit Weekends. I needed a rehearsal. I had to try out the idea on somebody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you guys played along?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't look at me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We all got sucked in just as bad as you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once they were killed off, yes. Everybody had to cooperate. Otherwise, none of it would have worked!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I guess there's no crazy twin sister Buffy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, there's a crazy twin all right, but his name isn't Buffy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His name? Muffy smiles, directing attention toward "cousin" Skip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skip?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's your brother?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bastard, you were in on the whole deal, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only the set-up. Muffy told me to say I was her cousin and to pull that prank on the ferry. I had no idea what was going to happen with Buck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Buck Williams. make-up artist par excellence, from Hollywood. Buck reaches down and tosses Arch's decapitated head to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, catch. Arch bobbles the head nervously. The others laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just some old props I redressed with the help of photographs Muffy sent me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It sure fooled me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what castle are you going to inherit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, first he's got to prove he can manage his own allowance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Constable) Which means, I guess, that you're no constable either.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kit Graham, meet my Uncle Frank St. John of St. John et Freres, Wall Street. Uncle Frank smiles and waves at Kit, but Harvey steps right over to him and starts pumping his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi! Harvey "Hal" Edison, Jr. Pleased to meet you, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Usually we don't even see Uncle Frank in the summer, he's so busy. But this time he made an exception.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I haven't had this much fun since my Hasty pudding Show sophomore year at Harvard. God, lowe you kids!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd I do? I never did no acting before. Boy, was I shaking!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cal's our regular ferryman between the mainland and the islands around here... but I thought he was up to the dramatic challenge. (BEAT: SMILING) Well, that's it. Now you know it all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have been had.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're lucky you didn't get yourself killed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I almost did with Harvey. And who could know there would be a snake out in the woods with Arch? But with the paying guests, they'll know what they're in for: and the scenario won't be nearly so extreme.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Otherwise, even Lloyd's of London won't cover you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...And I regret that, well, some of those fake clues I planted in the bedrooms I guess were taken too seriously. I'm sorry about that. She avoids looking at Nan so as not to draw attention to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont.) But we had fun, didn't we? I mean, come on. She starts passing .out chilled champagne bottles to the men to open, and setting up glasses on a sideboard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont.) I know I'll never forget this weekend for as long as I live.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're telling me. Man, when I was swinging around out there in the woods, I nearly crapped my pants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean, nearly? I was there, remember? Silence. Arch turns red.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arch? You browned your trousers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... I...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all right, Arch. They'll be out of the dryer soon. Suddenly everyone roars with laughter. Champagne corks start popping, and before you know it, the scene is resembling the locker room of the winning team of a championship series.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Breakfast. Spirits are high. Friendships rekindled, and the spread is incredible. Muffy enters with a fresh basket of piping hot biscuits. Only Nikki, Harvey, and Cal are not present.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great ham.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great eggs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just what we need. Another country inn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if the food's any indication, it's already half-way there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pass the toxic wastes, please. Uncle Frank frowns at Skip as Cal enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The St. John Island Bar Harbor ferry leaves in thirty minutes. No stragglers, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob and Kit are the first ones in, busing their dishes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boy, what a difference being alive makes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care what Columbia says about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this the road to med school?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it is. I'm going to try. He takes her by the hand and gazes at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But if I make it or not, no matter what happens, we'll be together? You and me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If that's what you want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I want. Muffy enters with a stack of dishes, followed by Nan who quietly sets her plate on the counter and leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Nikki?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. Too much champagne? o.s. they hear a muffled cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...as Harvey finishes plowing her field. They lie still for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God... don't tell me that was something you learned on the farm!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uncle Frank is hugging Muffy. (nothing seedy). They are alone out here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll make a full and glowing report to your father tomorrow so he can draw up the deed along with the other trust papers for Wednesday's signing. I'm so proud of you. (BEAT) I wish I could say the same about your brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Uncle Frank, he's been a great help this weekend, really. Let me get him out here so you can--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've already spoken with him. The screen door opens, and Rob steps out onto the porch. He comes over to them, but does not butt into their conversation, and Uncle Frank just keeps going as if Rob weren't even there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont.) His conduct and his academic performance remain inexcusable. He knows your father can't be expected to entrust him with anything until he shows some signs of responsibility and initiative.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (embarrassed to be overhearing) Excuse me. He turns and walks back into the house. O.S. a horn honking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The van and the old pickup are idling out front. Uncle Frank is honking on the van horn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Let's go! Cal is alone behind the wheel of the pickup. Skip walks casually up to the van, then pointedly turns away and heads over to the pickup instead. Uncle Frank scowls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob and Kit come out the door and stop beside Muffy. More honking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I hate to say it -- I still ought to kill you -- but thanks. (THEY HUG) See you back there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. If time is money, we're losing a fortune. Nikki now runs out followed closely by Harvey. They say their quick farewells and move along to the waiting vehicles. Harvey discreetly opts to ride in the pickup, while Nikki climbs aboard the van, passing Chaz who just glares at her. He knows. Finally Nan comes out of the house. With a curt nod to Muffy, she heads on toward the van when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nan! She hurries to catch up with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me say again how sorry I am. It wasn't intended.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And now all is forgiven. I played along, didn't I? What's done is done. (BEAT) I've learned a lot, Muffy, I really have. I suppose I should say thank you, but I don't think I would be able to without it sounding false. So I'll just say goodbye. (beat; an afterthought) Thanks for showing me your house. She turns and crosses to the van and climbs aboard. The others callout their last goodbyes. Muffy waves, and then they are gone and Muffy turns and walks forlornly back into her house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cal and Uncle Frank are the first ones onto the ferry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cal, I want to thank you personally. You've been a real sport about this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw, it was fun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know you've had your eye on that p1ace ever since we were kids. And I'm sure we could make a deal with you. I know you haven't been spending your money on anything else all these years... But... this time it just isn't in the cards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's still in the family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, that's the way. He moves on. Others are passing them now. Chaz stops and wags his finger at Cal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This time, no funny business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy stand, overlooking the mess. Not knowing exactly where to begin, she starts emptying ashtrays into each other, then just stops. She walks out of the living room and through the entry hall and slowly climbs the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SOUND  DAY From far away the ferry can be seen chugging away, slowly returning to the mainland.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: closer now we can see what's happening on board... Rob and Skip lean against the rail and talk quietly. Kit and Arch and Buck sit together and chat... Chaz sits alone, and Nikki sits apart from him, also alone. Nan is up front, gazing out over the bow, while Harvey stands beside her trying to make conversation. Finally, he gives up and strolls to the back of the craft, pointedly passing Nikki. He alights next to Uncle Frank, who has his briefcase open on his lap. Now Nikki stands and goes and sits down next to Chaz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feeling better?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm okay now, thanks. Pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaz, I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? What do we mean to each other anyway?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More than this a couple of days ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A couple of days ago... A couple of days ago I was a great, young, budding filmmaker who was going to turn pornography into high art. Today I'm just a stupid college kid with a toy camera and about as much idea as where he's going as... as... He gives up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll tell you what I've learned from all this. I'm tired of having one fling after another. I don't want any more of that. I want a boyfriend. (BEAT) Chaz? Will you be my boyfriend? He looks at her, slowly softening. Yes, he will. Rob turns away from Skip now, steps over and surveys the quiet group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some party, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what I think's weird?... how, when we thought 'Buck here got hurt because of Skip's prank, and when things started happening and we thought maybe some of us were getting killed, how we all just kind of naturally accepted the fact that it was 'oh , yeah, sure, because of the prank.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's like pranks really piss people off. It unleashes things, you know? Makes any kind of behavior possible, and we accept it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When anything g.oes, everything goes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What really amazes me is how easy we made it for her. Everyone was just out for himself. We could've stopped Muffy cold if we'd only stuck together, if we'd only worked like a team.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, she really got us good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I know what I'd do, if I wasn't her brother...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (almost without thinking) Go back and give her a taste of her own medicine, that's what we should do. Nikki steps. Leeks up, hearing herself. Skip returns the stare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shrugs, smiling) Did I say anything? The others look at each other, a beat, registering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go back and scare the shit outta her for a change? Outrageous!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She sure wouldn't be expecting it...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I don't know. I got a stack o' books this high...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stepping into the fray) Harvey's right. (to them all) Look, what're you talking about? We've had our fun. Now we got work to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Enough's enough. At least for me anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pussies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I kinda like the idea -- and I don't have work to get back to. She squares her shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looks up, in surprise) Kit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy can dish it out. It might be interesting to see if she can take it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right! A real catfight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (open-mouthed at her) I don't believe you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just because you've decided to get serious about your life, doesn't mean the rest of us can't have our fun
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whoops, turning) Buck, got any spare professional tricks you could throw our way! Buck looks up, confused, only now plugging in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how many does that make us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Much as I'd like to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I don't think so, thank you. Nikki continues count. Rob makes it easy for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four. He meets Kit's stare squarely, giving her time to change her mind. But Kit smiles back, victorious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (one of the four) Outasight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cal, we want to get back to the island.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now? You just left
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Well, not in this... (SMILES SLIGHTLY) ...but you might find something around after we dock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The big ferry drifts into the slip, and the passengers begin to disembark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The phone on the bedstand RINGS. Muffy answers it on the second ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: H'lo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skip is talking on a pay phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, it's me. Surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grumpily, stirring) What'd you forget now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. Just calling to tell you the party's not over. She moans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. The clean-up's going to take Clara and me at least a week.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I mean, some of the gang's planning on coming back to give you some of your own medicine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coming awake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're kidding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does a bear shit in the woods?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those bastards...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, they're your friends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which ones?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That wouldn't be very sporting if I told you, would it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skip...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob and Kit and Nikki and Chaz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Figures... Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Uncle Frank told me about his recommendations. So, I didn't want you to think there were any hard feelings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Skip, you dope. You know Daddy'll come around just as soon as you decide to buckle down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... (BEAT) Anyway, don't let the bastards eat you up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll try not to act too surprised when they arrive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you, Sis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You too, goofball. Skip hangs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Asshole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I beg your pardon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WIDENS to include Arch, who has been standing beside Skip the entire time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was even your idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A petty consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullshit. St. John blood is thicker than water, that's what you mean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you know? Old money sticks together. Arch goes to his car and drives away. At some distance, Harvey is chasing down Uncle Frank as the latter closes in on his Mercedes sedan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, can I look you up in a couple of months? Maybe you could arrange a job interview for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, sure . (reaches into his pocket) Here's my card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, sir. Thanks a lot. I sure appreciate it, and it's been a real pleasure meeting you. But Uncle Frank is already in the car and starting it up. Harvey looks down at the card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: UP - UNCLE FRANK'S BUSINESS CARD It reads simply: Franklin St. John, St. John et Freres.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, wait a minute! There's no phone number here! No address! No nothing! Too late. Uncle Frank is driving away. He speeds past Skip who is walking down the road further along. He doesn't even stop for his own nephew. Harvey kicks the dirt angrily. O.S. behind him a horn toots. Harvey turns and scowls at Nan, who would like to get past. He steps aside, and she peels away but she stops for Skip. They exchange a few words. Then he climbs into the front seat beside her, and she drives off. Now Harvey is alone. He looks around for a beat, then tosses the card away and moves toward his car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob and Chaz are trudging along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck was he talking about anyway? We might find something around after we dock? They walk out onto a private peer and eye the boats moored there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck do you think he was talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hey! What are you two doing down there?! Rob and Chaz look o.s. in response to the voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still trudging.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, now we've been identified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's getting late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a great idea this was. They round a bend and stop dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the distance, Kit and Nikki are climbing into a boat. Nikki sees them and waves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got one! Rob and Chaz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought we looked there an hour ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who cares? Let's get this show on the road! He starts running to the boat. Rob reluctantly follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calling back to them) Did you find a key? How're we going to get the motor started?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The house stands quiet, the dying rays of sunlight reflected off the large bay windows overlooking the sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as, huddled together in a rowboat, Chaz, Nikki, Rob and Kit arduously make their way back to the island.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FRONT ENTRY - NIGHT Looking at the front door. Someone is visible through the translucent glass pane coming up to the door. A knocking sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VARIOUS SHOTS AROUND THE HOUSE - SAME as o.s. the knocking continues. No sign of Muffy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy finally emerges from the study, crosses to the door and opens it. Nikki walks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy, hi! Surprise!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nikki, what on earth are you doing here? Is something wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, nothing's wrong. Chaz and I just figured there was nothing we had to get back to that couldn't wait and you could probably use a hand with the clean-up. It's our way of saying thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, great. Where is Chaz? Nikki is already moving into the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Putting the boat up in the old boathouse. He'll be up in a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DOCK AND BOAT HOUSE  NIGHT Nobody around and no sign of a boat...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...still and waiting
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy and Nikki are seated across from each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wonder what's keeping Chaz? He should have been up here by now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe he stopped to shit in the woods. You know Chaz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still... I'm beginning to not like this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By the way, where did you get the boat to come back here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The boat? Oh, Cal gave us one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, I need a drink of water. (RISING) You just stay here. I can get it myself. She walks out of the living room. Muffy looks after her and smiles to herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Nikki enters. She doesn't turn on any lights, but simply crosses to one of the kitchen windows and opens it. She gazes out into the night for a moment, then backs out of the kitchen...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...pulling the swinging door closed behind her. She turns, takes two steps toward the living room and stops; remembering her water. She goes back to the kitchen door, but suddenly it will not open for her. Frustrated, she heads back through the dining room, but stops dead halfway across and turns slowly and looks back at the kitchen door. She goes out of the dining room...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DOWNSTAIRS HALL - SAME ...and walks up to the other door into the kitchen. It too it's closed and will not yield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Nikki returns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about your water?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh', uh, I drank 'it in there. (BEAT) Listen. Muffy , I'm really getting worried about Chaz. I think we should go out and see what's happened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's okay. You go. I'll wait here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, really. I don't want to go alone. I'm still scared from last night. Please come with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure Chaz is fine. I'll stay here by the phone just in case. It's safer this way. (BEAT) Do you want a flashlight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, that's okay. I'll be fine. She strides out of the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Nikki comes out the front door and heads off into the woods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy sits quietly a moment, thinking. Then she gets up and goes toward the kitchen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She comes to the kitchen door, pushes it open... no sweat... and enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KITCHEN - SAME Muffy doesn't turn any lights on either. She goes to the sink, sees that there is no used water glass, then' she notices the open window. She smiles. She does get herself a bottle of Perrier out of the fridge, opens it, pours it and walks back out of the kitchen, leaving the window untouched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nikki stumbles through the darkness. Suddenly she disappears from view with a loud SPLASH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck! She comes up sputtering to the surface of a small forest pool she has fallen into.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck!! Who dug the goddamn swimming pool?!? She drags herself out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (o.s.) Nikki?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! She walks, dripping wet, into a clearing nearby where Kit it making Chaz up to look bloody and gruesome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . We have to go to plan B.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She wouldn't come out? Doesn't she care about me? No one answers him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont.) How do I look?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lot goddamn, fucking better than I do!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one is here as' Rob pops his head up outside and slips in through the open window. He stops in the middle of the kitchen and listens. Then he goes into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He creeps down the hall, then turns and starts to tiptoe up the back stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: further down the hall to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...just as Nikki bursts in through the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy! Muffy! Come quick! It's Chaz...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LIVING ROOM - SAME NIKKI (RUNNING IN) ...he's hurt! Oh, Godl! She stops suddenly. Muffy isn't here. Frustrated, Nikki runs back into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy!! She dashes into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muff--!!! ...and stops short. Muffy is lying face down in a pool of blood. Her throat's been cut. The useless phone receiver is clutched in her hand (making that constant phone company noise that lets you know the phone is off the hook).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy? Her throat gags a couple of times, as if she is about to be sick. She turns and flies out of the room. O.S. the front door slams shut behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S,) (HYSTERICAL) Chaz!! Chaz!! She runs into another clearing (the CAMERA has been here waiting for her) where Chaz is revealed lying on the ground, looking much more hideous than Muffy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaz, get up! Hurry, Chaz!... come on! He doesn't move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaz, stop playing around! Get up!! She starts kicking him in the side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaz! Chaz doesn't stir, but he does speak now without moving his lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hissing, pretending to be dead) Will you quit kicking me? It hurts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's supposed to hurt! The game's over! Get up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (still not moving) No. I'm dead. You're blowing the whole thing. Where's Muffy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy IS dead!!! In the house!!! (WHIMPERING) Oh, God...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sitting up suddenly) What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (turning to the woods) Kit! Kit, come out! There is rustling O.S., then Kit starts to emerge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy is still lying face down as we saw her last. She hears footsteps going upstairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob is creeping up the attic stairs when he hears footsteps o.s. too. He pauses, his face draining of color.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Chaz, Nikki and Kit come racing up to the door and run inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as they come charging in...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's gone! Nothing left, but the pool of blood and a thin trail of smeared drying blood to indicate that she's been dragged away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, she's been dragged away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaz! somebody's still in this house!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We could follow the trail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no... what about Rob? (HALF BEAT) Rob!! She races out of the study.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three of them come clambering up the stairs, Kit in the lead. They turn a corner. Then they see him... dead on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rob...? They run over to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dropping to her knees) Rob? Rob?? (shaking him: wailing) Rob!!! (dissolving into tears) It was only a game!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck is going on here?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaz, look! Clutched in Rob's lifeless hand is a leather bookmark we may have noticed before. Chaz slips it out from beneath his fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was Nan's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nan... Suddenly there is a loud KNOCK beneath them O.S. They all look up. Someone is coming slowly up the stairs, the loud footsteps O.S.that could only be made by a heavy boot, thundering closer... and closer... Kit and Nikki and Chaz huddle around Rob's body and await their approaching doom. Suddenly a dark figure fills the doorframe at the top of the stairs. A hand with a knife is raised. Nikki screams. Chaz spies a lamp on the floor. He turns it on...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy! Muffy walks into the room , lowering the knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good job, you guys. I'm really scared. (LOOKING DOWN) The fun's over, Rob.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (tears in her eyes) Muffy, he's dead!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody else is here! In this house!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Sure. (BENDING OVER) Let's see if the dead are ticklish, shall we?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pulling her away; screaming) Don't you touch him!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay, take it easy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy, it's not a game anymore! Just then there is a loud CRASH o.s. of glass breaking down on the first floor. After the slightest pause there is another crash o.s., and another... Someone is smashing in all the bay windows along the back porch. Nikki screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the--? And she runs back down the attic stairs, followed quickly by the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Muffy bursts out of the stairway and into the hall. Then Kit. Suddenly the door to the stairwell slams shut on Nikki and Chaz cutting them off. A key turns in the lock. Muffy and Kit turn back to see a male figure in the darkness who'd been hiding behind the door. Kit is nearest to him, and without warning, he lunges at her and buries a knife into her stomach up to the handle. Kit screams and chokes, trying to fight him off: but he stabs her again, and again and again, plunging the knife deep into her with every thrust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy! Stop him! Help! He's killing me! Oh, God! He's killing me! Muffy, initially paralyzed with fear, now runs for her life, down the hallway, down the stairs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and to the front door as Kit's screams O.S. fade to silence. Muffy yanks on the door handle, but the door will not open. She pulls again and again desperately, but it won't budge, She turns and runs out of the entry hall. Just as she CLEARS FRAME, the front door swings silently open...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muffy is racing past the back stairs toward the kitchen when A HAND reaches out from the pantry and hooks her around the face. She is pulled backward, screaming, through the swinging door into the darkened pantry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PANTRY  SAME It is Skip! He pulls her head back, exposing her throat. He raises a knife to it, still stained with Kit's blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all over, Muffy! Everything'll be mine!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skip! No! ! ! He makes a move to slit her throat, when Muffy kicks open the swinging door and sees...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...standing on the other side, smiling, in various states of fake blood and mess... Rob, Kit, Nikki, Chaz and Nan. Muffy's eyes pop out. Skip's hands relax. And the others burst out laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE HOUSE  DAY CLOSE UP
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: being lifted into the air. It reads:
direction.name: direction
